remarks: A small semigroup (with two elements) with two right identities which are different if ` A =/= B ` .  (Contributed by AV, 10-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mgm2nsgrp.s $e |- S = { A , B } $.
mgm2nsgrp.b $e |- ( Base ` M ) = S $.
sgrp2nmnd.o $e |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. S , y e. S |-> if ( x = A , A , B ) ) $.
sgrp2nmnd.p $e |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) $.
sgrp2rid2 $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> A. x e. S A. y e. S ( y .o. x ) = y ) $.
$d .o. x y $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d M x $.
$d S x y $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d x y $.
